title: The Video Game Developers Resisting Russia's Invasion

media:group.media:title: The Video Game Developers Resisting Russia's Invasion
media:group.media:description:
We meet some of the Ukrainian game developers living through the invasion of their home, from a refugee who escaped into Western Europe, to a fresh recruit in the Territorial Defence.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/PeopleMakeGames

Created by:

Chris Bratt
https://twitter.com/chrisbratt

Anni Sayers
https://twitter.com/anni_sayers

00:00 - Intro
00:46 - We meet a Ukranian dev forced to flee Ukraine
07:04 - Frogware's CEO on keeping the studio going
11:44 - Two Ukranian developers still in Kyiv
16:39 - A game developer who signed up to fight
19:18 - Raising money for Ukraine

#ukraine #ukrainewar
